title: 1.8光影模组放入MODS文件夹后，我的世界启动时崩溃
author: 浓硫酸
txt_content:
forge版本是  11.14.4.1572

报错信息如下
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----

WARNING: coremods are present:
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

// There are four lights!

Time: 16-7-11 下午2:34
Description: Initializing game

java.lang.RuntimeException: Shaders Mod detected. Please remove it, OptiFine has built-in support for shaders.
        at shadersmod.client.Shaders.checkShadersModInstalled(Shaders.java:4824)
        at shadersmod.client.Shaders.startup(Shaders.java:1569)
        at Config.initDisplay(Config.java:199)

        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.func_99999_d(Minecraft.java:325)
        at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:120)

        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:62)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:483)
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.launch(Launch.java:135)
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.main(Launch.java:28)

-- Initialization --

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
你的Forge不支持光影，建议换1521版本。
还有，先把Optifine删了再说。

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
浓硫酸 发表于 2016-7-11 14:46
两者不兼容吗？
实际上是这样的。
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... 33&pid=10442402

replies.author: 浓硫酸
replies.txt_content:
ItIsEnderman 发表于 2016-7-11 14:38
你的Forge不支持光影，建议换1521版本。
还有，先把Optifine删了再说。
谢谢，已解决，与Optifine不兼容，1572 forge可以使用
